contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Nestucca Bay NWR.jpg|thumb|320px|right|Nestucca Bay aerial view from the north. (USFWS)]] {{Coord|45|10|N|123|58|W|display=title}} '''Nestucca Bay''' is a [[bay]] formed by the confluence of the [[Nestucca River]] and the [[Pacific Ocean]] located in northwest [[Oregon]] in the [[United States]]. <ref>{{cite gnis |id=1163171 |name=Nestucca Bay |links=off |accessdate=2013-03-24}}</ref> It is located near the town of [[Pacific City, Oregon|Pacific City]] in southwestern [[Tillamook County, Oregon|Tillamook County]], approximately 12 mi (19 km) south of [[Cape Lookout (Oregon)|Cape Lookout]]. The bay is a bar-built [[estuary]] and totals {{convert|1000|acre|km2}} in area. <ref name="inv">{{cite web | url = http://ir.library.oregonstate.edu/xmlui/bitstream/handle/1957/3789/Nestucca_River_Estuary_ocr.pdf?sequence=1 | title = An Inventory of Filled Lands in Nestucca River Estuary | format = pdf | date = August 1972 | author = Advisory Committee to the State Land Board | publisher = Oregon State University Scholars Archive | page = 2 | accessdate = 2013-03-24 }}</ref> The Nestucca and [[Little Nestucca River|Little Nestucca]] rivers enter the bay. The bay is separated from the Pacific Ocean by the Nestucca Spit which includes [[Bob Straub State Park]]. A part of Nestucca Bay is included in the [[Nestucca Bay National Wildlife Refuge]]. ==References== <references /> ==External links== * {{cite web |title=Nestucca Bay National Wildlife Refuge |publisher=U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service |url=http://www.fws.gov/oregoncoast/nestuccabay/}} * {{cite web |title=Crabbing and Clamming in Nestucca Bay |publisher=Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife |url=http://www.dfw.state.or.us/mrp/shellfish/maps/Nestucca.asp}} [[Category:Bays of Oregon]] [[Category:Oregon Coast]] [[Category:Landforms of Tillamook County, Oregon]] {{TillamookOR-geo-stub}}
